name: Flour & Corn Tortillas
preparation: In a bowl, combine flour, cornmeal, oil and salt.
While stirring, pour in half the water until evenly mixed.
Using your hands form into a ball while adding more water, a little at a time, as needed. Knead until dough is smooth.
Cover with plastic wrap and let stand, at room temperature, for 30 minutes.
Divide into small balls; place one ball between two squares of parchment in Tortilla Press. Press down with handle. Repeat with remaining dough balls.
Heat a frying pan or griddle pan over medium-high heat. Fry each tortilla 1 minute per side or until golden.
Stack in a cloth and keep warm in a Steamer. Microwave to reheat, as needed.
